title: Our Team
subtitle: Meet the people behind the platform
description: Our diverse team of experts is passionate about creating the best web development tools and experiences.

team.name: Jane Doe
team.bio: With over 15 years of experience in web development, Jane leads our vision and strategy.

team.name: John Smith
